short_summary: Request For Standing Offer for All Terrain Vehicles
description: Establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) on an as and when needed basis for up to five years.
full_summary:
**Title:** Request For Standing Offer for All Terrain Vehicles - Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business

**Date:** December 9, 2022

**Closing Date:** January 17, 2023, 2:00 pm EST

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services - Government Departments

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for a national master standing offer (NMSO) for the supply of all terrain vehicles (ATVs) to departments and agencies of the Government of Canada and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users. The requirement is to establish a five-year NMSO on an as-and-when needed basis, with optional years.

**Key Requirements:**

* The supplier must be able to deliver ATVs to locations across Canada.
* The procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* The successful bidder will be required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing date.

**Amendment:**

Please disregard the original closing time and submit all required documentation and bid submissions by January 17, 2023, 2:00 pm EST.

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
